mapper.sql: FROM code as a LEFT JOIN codeGroup b ON b.ifcgSeq = a.ifcgSeq WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY a.ifcgSeq DESC
mapper.select:
SELECT aa.* FROM ( SELECT a.ifcdSeq, a.ifcdName, a.ifcdDelNy, a.ifcdUseNy, b.ifcgSeq, b.ifcgName
) aa limit #{pageNumToShow} offset #{startRnumForMysql}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO code ( ifcdSeq, ifcdName, ifcdDelNy, ifcdUseNy, ifcgSeq ) values ( #{ifcdSeq}, #{ifcdName}, #{ifcdDelNy}, #{ifcdUseNy}, #{ifcgSeq} )
mapper.update: UPDATE codeGroup SET ifcgName = #{ifcgName}, ifcgNickName = #{ifcgNickName}, ifcdName = #{ifcdName}, ifcgGender = #{ifcgGender}, ifcgVerify = #{ifcgVerify}, ifcgDelNy = #{ifcgDelNy} WHERE ifcgSeq = #{ifcgSeq}
mapper.select: SELECT ifcdSeq, ifcdName, ifcgSeq FROM code WHERE 1=1 AND ifcdDelNy = 0 AND ifcdUseNy = 1
